title: Sprint 03: Laravel Core Architecture
description: Understanding the 'Magic' and internal lifecycle of the framework to master the tool.
items: 01- PSR Standards: PSR-4 Autoloading vs Classmap, PSR-12 Coding Style, Composer internals
02- Laravel Lifecycle: public/index.php entry point, bootstrapping, termination info
03- The HTTP Kernel: Request capturing, Middleware stacks, Kernel handling flow
04- Service Container I: The IOC concept, bind(), singleton(), make(), resolving dependencies
05- Service Container II: Contextual binding, Tagging services, Interface binding
06- Facades: How they work (__callStatic), Real-time facades, Pros/Cons, Mockability
07- Service Providers: register() vs boot() phases, Deferrable providers optimization
08- Request Logic: Input handling, Header inspection, Boolean checks, Content negotiation
09- Response Factory: JSON responses, Downloads, File serving, Headers control, Macros
10- Configuration: .env files, Config caching, cascading config arrays, repository pattern
11- Directory Structure: Logic placement (Controllers vs Jobs vs Services vs Actions)
12- Artisan Console: Custom commands, I/O interaction, Signatures, Progress bars
13- Frontend Assets: Vite integration basics, mix() legacy, asset() helpers
14- Exception Handling: Handler class, custom render methods, reporting logic
15- Logging System: Monolog channels, Log levels, Contextual logging, Stack drivers
